title: Frascole, S. Martino a Poggio
description: A stips votiva was discovered at the site of the Christian church of San Martino a Poggio - Frascole in 1887. The main ancient activity at the site likely took place during the middle of the third century B.C.

properties.description: Location of the nearest modern settlement following coordinates derived from GeoNames.
